Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 70th overall pick, by Houston in 2011...
Injured on 9/2/2011 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Traded from Houston to Milwaukee on 2/8/2012 (Going to MIL: 1B S. Buckley, CF M. Taylor. Going to HOU: CF J. Rivera, P B. Backe)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/29/2016, off Oscar Guzman (CHN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/2016, off Miguel Gonzalez (CHN)...
Injured on 7/17/2016 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Traded from Milwaukee to Tampa Bay on 6/16/2017 (Going to MIL: C B. De La Rosa, DH B. Belt, CF T. Wheeler, P L. Shaw. Going to TB: P J. Gobble, 1B N. Swisher, CF G. Springer, 1B S. Buckley, SS T.
Tomiichi)...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 6/16/2017...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2017, hitting .246 with 40 HR, 106 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 8/30/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/19/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Oakland in 2023...
